hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1692 a and today's date is
October 17th 2018 and the title the
episode is biggest threat and two
independent goodbye fed let's get into
the economic collapse financial news now
we've been talking about the Fed in the
last couple of weeks and how Trump is
coming out and criticizing the Fed
saying that the Fed is raising rates too
rapidly this is not a good thing now
this is all part of the plan and we know
that the Fed is the biggest threat to
the American people a little bit later
in this report we're gonna be talking
about what Trump came out and said and
you can tell that he is going after the
Fed that this entire plan has been set
up for a very long time and now they're
pushing the agenda forward to remove the
Fed remove the deep state and reset the
entire economic system not just the
economic system but reset the economic
system the government system the entire
world system and we can see that we are
headed in this direction and what's very
interesting is that the global economy
is breaking down very very rapidly I
mean we're looking at many different
indicators yes if you go into the
mainstream media they're gonna tell you
you know the economy's back and
everything is great this is what Trump
has been putting out there and this is
what he wants everyone reporting on
except those mainstream media stations
that don't want to report on that but
he's forcing everyone to say to look at
him and say the economy is doing
fantastically he needs everyone to
understand that this is what the economy
is doing this way when the economy
breaks down and falls apart he can turn
around and point the finger at the
organization that did this because he
can say I palm
up the economy it's fantastic look who
brought it down and this is what he's
getting prepared to do but when we look
at the global economy and not just the
global economy but the economy in the US
and we look at all the different
indicators we can see that it is
breaking down in every different
economic sector now we've been following
the economy for quite a while and we've
been looking at all different of
different sectors we've been analyzing
them ripping them apart showing how it
was manipulated and this was all on
purpose so later on when everything
started to fall apart we could
understand what was going on here so we
could prepare for what was about to
happen and that is the entire system
being transitioned to a brand new system
and for those people who think well
we're never gonna go through a
transition we've gone through
transitions many many times before and
if you go back in history you can see
those transitions some were a lot worse
than others most of them had some may be
some type of war around it to cover it
up this time it's gonna be a little
different hopefully because we don't

now to push a war and we can see that we
are definitely heading for a transition
but when we look at the different
economic indicators here in the US and
around the world we see things that are
definitely are definitely falling apart
look at the global car sales I mean this
is a global Carmageddon right now and
the wave is spreading across the world
and two weeks ago we talked about how
the US had terrible auto sales now we
see that China their passenger car
dealerships plunged by 12% and we see
European car sales they have plunged by
23% now this is not a good sign and I
know there's new tests in Europe and
things like that but once again it would
only happen in certain areas we're
seeing it everywhere it's all happening
at once now if we look in the US and we
look at the housing market once again we
see housing star
they have collapsed in September they
slumped by 5.3% permit they also dropped
for the fifth month of the last six and
the situation in the housing market is
collapsing very very rapidly right now
and why is this happening well you have
to remember the Fed is raising interest
rates as you raise interest rates those
people who are making a certain income
who wanted a certain price house they're
thrown out of the market they can't
afford that house anymore and most of
the people say well you know something
I'm just gonna wait and they get
themselves out of the market and they
don't want to shop around for a house
and as the rates continually move up
well that's a lot less people who want
to buy if there's a lot less people who
want to buy then lending is gonna
decline and if lending is declining then
those people who are selling they're
gonna be taking those houses off the
market because they don't see traffic
and people are gonna ask for the price
of the house to come down so they can
actually purchase it I mean the whole
thing is repeating what happened in 2006
2007 2008 and right now we can see that
single-family starts they drop by four
five point three percent
single units down are down negative
point nine percent multifamily starts
are crashing by negative twelve point
nine percent and if we look at mortgage

point one percent last week and mortgage

when you look at this you can see over
time since 2011 2012 we are headed in a
downward trajectory which means
applications are declining right now
Bank of America sees at Wells Fargo sees
it and many other banks see it and what
this means is the economy is breaking

asphalt cement lumber you name it
a
connects to all these different areas
and then it connects to home furnishing

dishwashers refrigerators and things

u.s. right now

he's using their weapon against them
think about it
